name: Mr. Alistair Dowd
desc: Retired attorney. Sleeps exactly eight hours. Any noise at all and the Yelp review writes itself.
request: Extra pillow and complete silence after 9pm

name: The Pemberton Sisters
desc: Three sisters here for a funeral, already arguing about the estate.
request: Separate dinner reservations since they cannot sit together

name: Professor Weir
desc: Parapsychologist. Here for the atmosphere. Voice recorders left in every corridor.
request: Access to any locked room he can study

name: Beatrice Moss
desc: Travel writer. Whatever happens here ends up in print.
request: A local story worth writing about

name: Mr. and Mrs. Caldwell
desc: 40th anniversary. He is nearly deaf. She is pretending the mirror shows nothing unusual.
request: A bottle of champagne sent up, discreetly

name: Derek Flint
desc: Influencer with a large following. Always filming.
request: Permission to film the third floor hallway

name: Sister Marguerite
desc: A nun on sabbatical. Prefers silence and prayer.
request: A quiet space for morning meditation

name: Dr. Finch Haywood
desc: Cardiologist attending a nearby conference.
request: Fridge stocked with mineral water, no ice

name: The Kowalski Family
desc: Parents and three kids. The youngest converses with something unseen.
request: Rollaway bed and a reasonable explanation for the noises

name: Marcus Bellany
desc: City councilman checking in under a false name.
request: Total discretion

name: Ruth Halverson
desc: Retired schoolteacher. Quiet and steady.
request: Extra blanket and no wake up calls

name: Theo and Priya Nair
desc: Architects taking notes on the building.
request: Original floor plans or blueprints if available

name: Gus Okafor
desc: True crime podcaster. Microphone always on.
request: Any documented incident reports from the past thirty years

name: Lenora Banks
desc: Psychic medium. Claims to sense several presences.
request: To be left entirely alone between 2am and 4am

name: Mr. Hideo Tanaka
desc: Retired diplomat. Precise and private.
request: Green tea (real)

name: Candace Pruitt
desc: Landscape painter seeking morning light.
request: Natural light access on Floor 2 early morning

name: The Osworth Twins
desc: Identical twins who both deny breaking the lamp.
request: A second key to their room

name: Dr. Sylvia Crane
desc: Folklorist writing about local hauntings.
request: Access to archive materials

name: Ronnie Delacroix
desc: Jazz musician between gigs.
request: A piano or something to play

name: The Yamamura Party
desc: Corporate retreat, eight attendees.
request: Private meeting room with a working projector

name: Mrs. Harriet Bloom
desc: Widow, 81. Exacting about schedules.
request: Breakfast in-room at exactly 7:30am

name: Officer Diego Reyes
desc: Off-duty detective. Quiet and watchful.
request: Quiet

name: The Aldrich Girls
desc: Twin children, about nine years old.
request: Someone to find them if lost

name: W. Torrington
desc: Long-term guest working on a manuscript.
request: More paper

name: Lloyd Beaumont
desc: Impeccably dressed, often at the bar.
request: Whatever the guest in Room 11 is having

name: Mr. and Mrs. Torrence
desc: Honeymoon couple; playful and curious.
request: A typewriter if one exists

name: Clarice Voss
desc: FBI consultant on leave; observes everything.
request: Full access to guest registry going back ten years

name: Dr. Malcolm Greer
desc: Child psychologist; talks to plants.
request: A quiet room on a floor where children are staying

name: The Beaumont Brothers
desc: Brothers settling an estate.
request: Hotel records from 1987

name: Miss Haversham
desc: Requests room left exactly as-is, including a stopped clock.
request: Leave the stopped clock

name: Father Damien Ortiz
desc: Catholic priest doing casual blessings.
request: A quiet room far from Room 7

name: Konstantin Volkov
desc: Chess grandmaster. Rearranges the lobby chess set.
request: An opponent worthy of his time

name: The Nakamura Quartet
desc: Four musicians praising the acoustics.
request: Permission to rehearse in the lobby after midnight

name: Prudence Merriweather
desc: Retired librarian; left a note about noise.
request: An explanation about Room 12 in writing

name: Silas Thorne
desc: Antiques dealer with a keen eye.
request: Appraisal access to items older than 1920

name: The Okonkwo Wedding Party
desc: Twelve guests for a weekend wedding.
request: Ballroom prepared by Saturday evening

name: Ingrid Solberg
desc: Norwegian archaeologist keeping a diary.
request: Any original structural documents or building history
